column1: The Pit Room////Delicious!! We got the chicken tacos
column3: ribs and brisket. A word of warning -- the two plate dinner is a lot of food
column4: even if it doesn't look like it at first. You can't split meats on the one plate dinner so recommend getting two with different meats and sharing with a friend. My friend from Washington literally had a religious experience upon his first bite of brisket.
